title: GoHighLevel Tutorial for Beginners 2026 - Step by Step
author: Metics Media
transcript:
- Hey, I'm Dan. And in this tutorial, I'll walk you step by
step through GoHighLevel, one of the most powerful
all-in-one marketing and sales platforms for small businesses. It combines CRM, email
marketing, scheduling, payments, and other tools all into
one single platform. Especially if you're a beginner, GoHighLevel has so much functionality that it's normal to feel

choosing that for most people. You can always switch to the
